note.p: Career: Physician to the daughter of the King of Sardinia and Piedmont (Charles Augustus), who married the Comte d'Artois, brother of Louis XVI; went to Versailles with the King's daughter in the course of his job and survived the Revolution; Professor of Medicine at Padua (aged 75); returned to Padua (c 1790)
Authority: Supplementary information provided by Caroline Harbouri, for whom there is a Library registration form
Notes: Possible years of death 1801 or 1804
